DOC.brief_summary: Hypertensive disorder pregnancy ( HDP ) 50.000 death every year one major cause maternal mortality worldwide , especially low middle income country . This trial aim determine whether daily dose combine low-dose aspirin , calcium , vitamin D3 , folic acid vitamin B12 pregnancy reduces incidence pregnancy-induced hypertension woman risk . Secondary tertiary objective include maternal neonatal outcome .
